AD_HalfOrcs_AtTower.synopsis: Half orcs after arriving at Moonrise Towers with the Drider's caravan. Kansif is the solemn leaderm, the other half orc is a relatively new recruit and doesn't guard his tongue too well.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint.synopsis: The player approaches a goblin camp. Three goblins and a yena are huddled around a campfire, warily watching the shifting shadows. As you step into the light, one of the goblins steps forward to greet you. You can ask him about the shadowy environs, and he will demonstrate the shadow-curse by killing the hyena.
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint.how_to_trigger: - Load SCL Main.- Enter the main SCL map via the mountain pass and proceed to the goblin camp below.- Dialog will start as you approach the goblin at the entrance.

GoblinRanger_Dead.synopsis: Speak with dead dialog with goblin ranger from the caravan. Only available if at the start of SCL Minthara is dead.
GoblinRanger_Dead.how_to_trigger: Arrive from act 1 with Minthara dead or use oe SCL_Drider_GoblinSwD.or in debug book: Go to Region - Act 2 - SCL - Entry point -Mountain passteleport S_SCL_DriderCaravan_GoblinRangerctrl shift k characterin debug book: useful spells - speak with deadcast SwD spell on dead goblin

AD_Goblins_AtTower.synopsis: Goblins relaxing at Moonrise Towers after arriving with the Drider's caravan.

AD_HalfOrcs_AtTower_4.speaker: Kansif
AD_HalfOrcs_AtTower_4.text: Remember to show respect. Anyone here could be a True Soul.

AD_HalfOrcs_AtTower_1.speaker: Bedi
AD_HalfOrcs_AtTower_1.text: I can... feel them. True Souls - it's like they send out ripples.

AD_HalfOrcs_AtTower_2.speaker: Kansif
AD_HalfOrcs_AtTower_2.text: Aye. They're Her vessels. You can feel the strength of their faith, like a tickle at the back of your mind, whenever they approach.

AD_HalfOrcs_AtTower_5.speaker: Kansif
AD_HalfOrcs_AtTower_5.text: And if you don't show respect, you'll feel their faith like a fist to your gut.

AD_HalfOrcs_AtTower_6.speaker: Bedi
AD_HalfOrcs_AtTower_6.text: I wonder what this place looked like in its glory.

AD_HalfOrcs_AtTower_7.speaker: Bedi
AD_HalfOrcs_AtTower_7.text: Still. I bet Ketheric changed his wall hangings as often as his gods.

AD_HalfOrcs_AtTower_8.speaker: Kansif
AD_HalfOrcs_AtTower_8.text: Careful. The General has excellent hearing, I'm told.

AD_HalfOrcs_AtTower_9.speaker: Kansif
AD_HalfOrcs_AtTower_9.text: Rest while you can. We have no more pilgrims to herd for a time.

HalfOrcCaster_AD_DriderDies_0.speaker: Kansif
HalfOrcCaster_AD_DriderDies_0.text: Our guide is dead - and so are we if they take the lantern!

GoblinMelee_000_AD_DriderDies_0.speaker: Brawler Vez
GoblinMelee_000_AD_DriderDies_0.text: The boss is down! Don't let 'em get away with the light!
GoblinMelee_000_AD_DriderDies_0.context: InternalNodeContext: 'the boss'= the drider (male). 'em = the Harpers (mixed genders)

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_7.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_7.text: Hey boy - yeh want the bone? Yeh want the bone?
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Bends down and picks up a bone, which he waggles at a hyena. The hyena bounces with excitement, ready to play fetch.NodeContext: Bends down and picks up a bone, which he waggles at a hyena.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_9.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin yeets the bone into the shadows - the hyena turns run after it.NodeContext: Goblin throws the bone into the shadows

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hyena chases the bone into the shadows and we lose sight of the beast. From the darkness we hear a growl, then a whimper, then a sickening crunch and a yelp as the beast is killed.InternalNodeContext: The hyena chases the bone into the shadow curse and disappears into the darkness. After a moment you hear a growl, then a yelp and a *crunch* as the animal's killed (all out of sight).

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_26.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gronag spots the player and raises his crossbow. A beat, then he relaxes.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_46.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_46.text: Heh. You see that blighter go? Swallowed whole by the shadow curse. Bet he was pure tasty.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_19.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_19.text: You're the True Soul we're taking to Moonrise, I'm guessing?

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_3.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_3.text: Right you are. Go through and talk to Kansif - he's been waitin'.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_59.speaker: Player
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_59.text: Why would you just assume that?

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_55.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_55.text: Who else is gonna be wandering around in the dark?

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_48.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_48.text: Besides - you got the stink of power on you. You learn to smell it, serving the Absolute.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_18.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_18.text: Go on through and speak to Kansif. He's not as honey-tongued as me, mind.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_1.speaker: Player
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_1.text: Speaking of power - go on and fetch that bone you threw.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_8.speaker: Player
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_8.text: I have power in spades, that's true - but it comes from me, not the Absolute.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_23.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_23.text: I meant it as a compliment, True Soul! No sweeter stink there is than that of power - yours, of course.
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_23.context: NodeContext: charming, bit of a lick arse

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_29.speaker: Player
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_29.text: I was sent here by another goblin.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_61.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_61.text: That'd be Rizzle. Huh. Thought she'd be back by now. Oh well.
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_61.context: NodeContext: knows rizzle is likely dead. Doesn't care

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_0.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_0.text: The curse gets deadlier the further you go in. But have no fear, boss. We've got a guide.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_50.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_50.text: Talk to Kansif inside - he'll run through it.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_24.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_24.text: Anything for a True Soul. Put in a good word for me at Moonrise, eh?

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_20.speaker: Player
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_20.text: One last thing - go and fetch the bone you threw.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_54.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_54.text: But we're ready to go. You just need to tell Kansif inside.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_64.speaker: Player
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_64.text: Shoot him a knife-glare: you are worse than the shadows.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_36.speaker: Player
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_36.text: Those who refuse me do not live for very long.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_42.speaker: Player
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_42.text: Refuse me again and I'll strike you down with the power of the divine.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_57.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_57.text: So you want me to... I mean, I'll just-...
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_57.context: NodeContext: Hesitant, looking for a way out

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_62.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_62.context: CinematicNodeContext: Walks into the darkness. Pause - then screams.NodeContext: Being killed off-screen by creepy shadows

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_11.speaker: Hyena
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sad that the goblin is dead

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_35.speaker: Narrator
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_35.text: *You focus on the source of the power, but it is quiet and still. It needs to rest.*

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_15.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_15.text: Ha! Haha! Of course. Good one.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_38.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_38.text: Now, eh... we'd best get goin', eh?
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_38.context: NodeContext: very keen to get out of this conversation

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_65.speaker: Player
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_65.text: Stay quiet. Let the wretched thing live.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_58.speaker: Player
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_58.text: Relax. Just poking a little fun.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_30.speaker: Player
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_30.text: A guide? I know of no man nor beast that could traverse such darkness unaided.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_14.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_14.text: You don't know? Oh, you're gonna soil yourself when you see him. But I won't spoil the surprise - that's for Kansif. Head on in.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_25.speaker: Player
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_25.text: How do you plan on getting me through this cursed darkness?

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_6.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_6.text: Don't worry boss, you're in good hands. We've got a guide.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_27.speaker: Player
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_27.text: I thought light was enough to keep the curse at bay.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_4.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_4.text: Aye, in the shallows. But the curse don't care 'bout some itty bitty light once you get deeper. But don't worry, boss - we've got a guide.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_28.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_28.text: Argh! Hells - I near stained myself.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_40.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_40.text: Just seeing if this shadow curse is as bad as they say. Word is it eats anyone gets too deep into the dark.

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_22.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_22.text: I take it you're the True Soul we're waiting on? Needs passage to Moonrise?

GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_17.speaker: Warrior Gronag
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_17.text: Ready when you are, True Soul. Anything you need.
GoblinMelee_001_Checkpoint_17.context: NodeContext: A little spooked by the player

HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_1.speaker: Kansif
HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_1.text: Hold there! One step closer and -

HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_9.speaker: Kansif
HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_9.text: True Soul - forgive me, I did not see you in the dark.

HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_13.speaker: Player
HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_13.text: I could kill you for speaking to me like that.

HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_7.speaker: Kansif
HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_7.text: If it was the Absolute's will.

HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_8.speaker: Kansif
HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_8.text: But you had best wait until we get to Moonrise. Otherwise you might be missing a guide through the darkness.

HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_11.speaker: Kansif
HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_11.text: Speak to me if you are ready to leave. Until then - welcome to the shadow curse.

HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_14.speaker: Player
HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_14.text: How did you know I was a True Soul?

HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_4.speaker: Kansif
HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_4.text: We were forewarned - told to wait for someone like you.

HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_10.speaker: Kansif
HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_10.text: Besides, I cannot think who else would be walking these shadows.

HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_5.speaker: Kansif
HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_5.text: Speak to me if you want to get moving. Until then, welcome to the most cursed place in Faerûn.

HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_6.speaker: Kansif
HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_6.text: You have the look. You come to recognise it if you spend enough time around the Absolute's lieutenants.

HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_0.speaker: Player
HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_0.text: Minthara sent me. She said you'd get me to Moonrise.

HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_2.speaker: Kansif
HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_2.text: Of course, we've been waiting. Speak to me when you're ready to depart.

HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_12.speaker: Kansif
HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_12.text: What - you'll die for this, traitor!
HalfOrcCaster_Checkpoint_12.context: NodeContext: Half orc Realising the person they thought was an ally is about to attack

GoblinRanger_Dead_22.speaker: Narrator
GoblinRanger_Dead_22.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

GoblinRanger_Dead_7.speaker: Player
GoblinRanger_Dead_7.text: Who or what is the Absolute?

GoblinRanger_Dead_5.speaker: Narrator
GoblinRanger_Dead_5.text: *The corpse remains silent. It does not know.*

GoblinRanger_Dead_26.speaker: Narrator
GoblinRanger_Dead_26.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

GoblinRanger_Dead_28.speaker: Narrator
GoblinRanger_Dead_28.text: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

AD_Goblins_AtTower_0.speaker: Brawler Vez
AD_Goblins_AtTower_0.text: Wonder if there's dancing down in the war camp. Feelin' frisky.
AD_Goblins_AtTower_0.context: NodeContext: Despite the playful phrase, makes it sound threatening.

AD_Goblins_AtTower_1.speaker: Brawler Vez
AD_Goblins_AtTower_1.text: Can you hear what I'm thinking, oh Absolute? 'S dirty.
AD_Goblins_AtTower_1.context: NodeContext: Talking to the air, mocking this "psychic" god she only half believes in

AD_Goblins_AtTower_2.speaker: Brawler Vez
AD_Goblins_AtTower_2.text: Stronghold of the Absolute, eh? Well I ain't praying.
AD_Goblins_AtTower_2.context: NodeContext: Taking in vast expanse of tower, unimpressed

AD_Goblins_AtTower_3.speaker: Brawler Vez
AD_Goblins_AtTower_3.text: Lots of fat little halflings in that tower. Damn waste of meat.
AD_Goblins_AtTower_3.context: NodeContext: Grumbling - he's use to eating halflings, not allying with them
